mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_topic ( class_id, title, body, user_id, reply_count, modified_by, modified_on, replied_by, replied_on, is_close, ip, create_time ) VALUES ( #{classId}, #{title}, #{body}, #{userId}, #{replyCount}, #{modifiedBy}, #{modifiedOn}, #{repliedBy}, #{repliedOn}, #{isClose}, #{ip}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT class_id classId, title title, body body, user_id userId, reply_count replyCount, modified_by modifiedBy, modified_on modifiedOn, replied_by repliedBy, replied_on repliedOn, is_close isClose, ip ip, create_time createTime FROM t_topic ORDER BY create_time desc limit 0,10
